    • Highlights

    • This Golden Triangle Tour covers Delhi, Agra, and Jaipur, known for their rich cultural heritage.
    • Delhi offers a mix of modernity and history with sites like India Gate, Red Fort, Qutub Minar, and Lotus Temple.
    • Agra is home to the magnificent Taj Mahal, a symbol of love and one of the Seven Wonders of the World.
    • Fatehpur Sikri, a historic Mughal city near Agra, showcases impressive architecture and cultural significance.
    • Jaipur, the Pink City, captivates with its forts, palaces, and vibrant bazaars, including Amber Fort and Hawa Mahal.
    • The tour provides a journey through Indian history, Mughal architecture, and Rajasthan's royal heritage.

    Golden Triangle Tour - 5 Nights / 6 Days

    Day 1: Arrival in Delhi

    • Arrive in Delhi, the capital of India, and transfer to your hotel.
    • Evening sightseeing at India Gate, Lotus Temple, and Connaught Place.
    • Overnight stay at a hotel in Delhi.

    Day 2: Delhi City Tour

    • Full-day tour covering Red Fort, Qutub Minar, Jama Masjid, and Humayun's Tomb.
    • Explore bustling markets like Chandni Chowk.
    • Overnight stay at a hotel in Delhi.

    Day 3: Delhi to Agra

    • Drive to Agra after breakfast.
    • Visit the iconic Taj Mahal and Agra Fort.
    • Overnight stay at a hotel in Agra.

    Day 4: Agra to Jaipur

    • After breakfast, drive to Jaipur, with a stop at Fatehpur Sikri en route.
    • Arrive in Jaipur and check in to the hotel.
    • Evening visit to local markets or a cultural show.
    • Overnight stay at a hotel in Jaipur.

    Day 5: Jaipur City Tour

    • Full-day tour covering Amber Fort, City Palace, Jantar Mantar, and Hawa Mahal.
    • Explore the Pink City’s vibrant culture and shopping areas.
    • Overnight stay at a hotel in Jaipur.

    Day 6: Departure from Jaipur

    • After breakfast, transfer to Jaipur or Delhi airport for onward journey.
    • End of the Golden Triangle Tour.
